title: The Media Missed this Hidden Bombshell in the IG Report (Ep 1132)
description:
In this episode, I address the explosive comments by Attorney General Bill Barr yesterday and the hilarious media reaction. I also address an explosive revelation in the IG report that escaped media scrutiny. News Picks:The REAL “Person of the Year” is Devin Nunes. 

 

A solid article, in a left-leaning outlet, about the devastating IG report. 

 

The IG report uncovered intense political bias against Trump. 

 

Adam Schiff confirms that the impeachment hoax is all about the 2020 election. 

 

FBI Director Chris Wray isn’t up to the job.

 

President Trump fires back at the FBI Director.

 

Border crossings are down 75% and experts credit President Trump. 

 

Moderate Democrats are sweating over the upcoming impeachment vote. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
